law.catch_line: Same—Packages and labeling, requirements, variations generally.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-98. Same—Packages and labeling, requirements, variations generally.
Packaging and labeling regulations adopted by the National Conference on Weights and Measures, sponsored by the National Bureau of Standards, may be promulgated by the Director upon filing such regulations with the Clerk of the Board of County Commissioners, which regulations shall thereafter have the force and effect of law.
